content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or emotions, but Soul Train has definitely been an iconic show that has left a lasting impact on popular culture. The show, which ran for over 35 years, has contributed greatly to the music and dance scene, providing a platform for emerging artists and dancers. Many people have their own favorite moments from Soul Train, and it's great to see how the show has influenced and touched so many people over the years.
